column5: i'm going to niagara  tommorow to pick someone up an on the way back i will check out a river around there...where is a good spot to check for fishng? american eel or salmon runs?any thing i should check out in the niagara rivers as far as rivers wise?like checking if anglers are fishing for salmon i'm going at 6:00 am to pick my daughter up so going back around 9:00am
No salmon yet, pat. Eels can be caught some nights down at Queenston on the lower Niagara River. Havent heard of them being on the piers yet, but with this weird summer, its hard to say.
